file_insights.changes_summary: Added error handling with toast notifications replacing console.error statements
key_modifications: Imported useToast hook from ToastProvider component
Integrated showError and showSuccess functions from useToast
Replaced console.error in loadProjects catch block with showError toast
Replaced console.error in handleAddProject catch block with showError toast
Added showSuccess notification after successful project creation

patterns_discovered.description: Replacing silent console.error logging with user-facing toast notifications using a custom useToast hook
patterns_discovered.applicability: Can be applied to other pages/components with async operations

patterns_discovered.description: Providing user confirmation on successful async operations using showSuccess toast
patterns_discovered.applicability: Improves user experience by confirming successful actions

patterns_discovered.description: Using generic user-friendly error messages ('Please try again') instead of exposing technical error details

gotchas_discovered.description: Implementation relies on ToastProvider being available in component tree; will fail if not properly wrapped
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Ensure ToastProvider wraps the entire application or at minimum the ProjectsPage component

gotchas_discovered.description: Generic error messages hide actual error details which may complicate debugging
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Consider logging actual error details to console for development while showing user-friendly messages

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully replaced console-based error handling with toast notification system for improved UX
approach_outcome.user_experience_improvement: Users now receive visible feedback on errors and successes instead of silent failures

recommendations.recommendation: Add detailed error logging to console alongside user-friendly toast messages for development debugging
recommendations.rationale: Balances user experience with developer debugging needs

recommendations.recommendation: Apply the same toast-based error handling pattern to other pages with async operations
recommendations.rationale: Consistent error handling across the application improves maintainability and user experience

recommendations.recommendation: Verify that error catch blocks properly type check errors before use
recommendations.rationale: Ensures robustness when handling unknown error types from API calls

recommendations.recommendation: Consider adding error state alongside loading state for more granular UI control
recommendations.rationale: Would allow displaying error-specific UI states instead of relying solely on toast notifications
